title: David Kelley, Co-Founder of IDEO
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with David Kelley, the co-founder of IDEO, a global design firm. Harris also speaks with Jonathan Cedar, co-founder of BioLite.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with David Kelley, the co-founder of IDEO, a global design firm. Harris also speaks with Jonathan Cedar, co-founder of BioLite.
